question: Which among the following is correct about “My Dear Kuttichathan”?
option1: It was First Malayalam Movie of India
option2: It was First 3-D Movie of India
option3: It was first technicolor movie of India
option4: It was first film in 70 mm
answer: It was First 3-D Movie of India
explanation: My Dear Kuttichathan is a 1984 Malayalam-language film directed by Jijo Punnoose and produced by his father Navodaya Appachan. It was the first Indian film to be filmed in 3D format.
